meanings.definition: A person with whom one works, typically in a profession or business.
meanings.sent1: My colleague and I collaborate on projects at the office.
meanings.sent2: She is my colleague at the law firm.
meanings.sent3: My colleague always brings the best snacks to work!
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, a reliable colleague is like a valuable asset.
meanings.sent5: I remember my colleague's name by associating it with the word 'work'.

meanings.definition: A fellow member of a team or organization.
meanings.sent1: Our team's success is due to the hard work of every colleague.
meanings.sent2: He is a respected colleague in our community group.
meanings.sent3: During the team-building exercise, my colleague surprised us with his dance moves.
meanings.sent4: Each colleague in our group is a unique puzzle piece that fits perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The bond between colleagues is like a strong thread weaving through our organization.
